attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please consider a pension for ex servicemen who served this country and left after our contract expired. We paid into a pension uwittingly from our pay, and upon leaving the service we were told we were not entitled to a pension unless we had served 22years.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
